title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2269/95 of 27 September 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 781/95 as regards the date for the communication of reference quantities for 1996
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2269/95 of 27 September 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 781/95 as  regards the date for the communication of reference quantities for 1996
THE  COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 781/95 '1 October 1995` is hereby  replaced by '15 November 1995`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official  Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 September 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
